userInvite.subject: Welcome to {siteName} - Activate Your Account
userInvite.body1: {adminName} has created an account for you on {siteName}.
userInvite.body2: To activate your account and set up your password, please click the link below:
userInvite.body3: This link will expire in 24 hours.
userInvite.body4: If you have any questions, please contact your administrator.
userInvite.name: Name:

passwordReset.subject: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.body1: You requested a password reset for your {siteName} account.
passwordReset.body2: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.body3: This link will expire in 1 hour.
passwordReset.body4: If you didn't request this reset, please ignore this email.

activity.createdTaskAtTop: created task "{taskTitle}" at top of column in "{boardTitle}"
activity.addedComment: added comment on task "{taskTitle}"{taskRef} in board "{boardTitle}"
activity.updatedComment: updated comment on task "{taskTitle}"{taskRef} in board "{boardTitle}"
activity.deletedComment: deleted comment on task "{taskTitle}"{taskRef} in board "{boardTitle}"
activity.associatedTag: associated tag "{tagName}" with task "{taskTitle}"{taskRef} in board "{boardTitle}"
activity.removedTag: removed tag "{tagName}" from task "{taskTitle}"{taskRef} in board "{boardTitle}"
activity.associatedSprint: associated sprint "{sprintName}" with task "{taskTitle}"{taskRef} in board "{boardTitle}"
activity.removedSprint: removed sprint "{sprintName}" from task "{taskTitle}"{taskRef} in board "{boardTitle}"
